summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 11%) and rainfall (up 1.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 10665 lux) and cloud levels (up 244 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14940 lux), the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 566 m), and rainfall (down 1.1 mm) when compared to today.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 269m to a maximum of 930m, averaging 299.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 801.0m and 866.3m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, humidity should not be a concern and light winds will prevail. Periods of rain anticipated, overcast skies with low cloud, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Changeable conditions.
